# These are optionally defined in the parent markdown document and affect

has_species <- exists("focal_species")
has_url <- exists("doc_url")

# is_html should be defined in parent document but is patched here
# for test rendering the child independently
if(!exists("is_html"))
  is_html <- TRUE

### License

```{r license, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}

link_to_model <- has_url && has_species

if(is_html){
  license <- paste0(
    '<p xmlns:cc="http://creativecommons.org/ns#" ',
    'xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">',
    ifelse(link_to_model, 
           paste0('<a property="dct:title" rel="cc:attributionURL" ', 
                  'href="', doc_url, '">', focal_species, 
                  ' BirdFlow Model</a>'), 
           "Bird Flow Models"),
    ' by <a rel="cc:attributionURL dct:creator" property="cc:attributionName" ', 
    'href="https://birdflow-science.github.io/">BirdFlowScience</a>',
    ifelse(link_to_model, ' is ', ' are '),
    'licensed under ', 
    '<a href="https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/?ref=chooser-v1" ', 
    'target="_blank" rel="license noopener noreferrer" ', 
    'style="display:inline-block;">',
    'CC BY 4.0',
    '<img style="height:22px!important;margin-left:3px;vertical-align:text-bottom;" ', 
    'src="https://mirrors.creativecommons.org/presskit/icons/cc.svg?ref=chooser-v1" alt="">',
    '<img style="height:22px!important;margin-left:3px;vertical-align:text-bottom;" ', 
    'src="https://mirrors.creativecommons.org/presskit/icons/by.svg?ref=chooser-v1" alt="">',
    '</a></p>', sep = "")
} else {
  if (link_to_model) {
    license <- paste0(
      "[", focal_species, " BirdFlow Model](", doc_url, ") © 2024 by ", 
      "[BirdFlowScience](https://birdflow-science.github.io/) is licensed under",
      " [CC BY 4.0 ![](https://chooser-beta.creativecommons.org/img/cc-logo.f0ab4ebe.svg)", 
      sep = "")
  } else {
    license <- paste0(
      "BirdFlow Models © 2024 by ", 
      "[BirdFlowScience](https://birdflow-sciece.github.io/) are licensed under",
      " [CC BY 4.0 ![](https://chooser-beta.creativecommons.org/img/cc-logo.f0ab4ebe.svg)", 
      sep = "")
  }
}

cat("\n", license, "\n", sep ="")
```
